meanings.definition: Excessive or immoderate indulgence in something, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: Her overindulgences in sweets led to health issues.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of overindulgences in delicious treats.
meanings.sent3: His overindulgences in desserts always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The city's overindulgences in luxury were evident in its extravagant buildings.
meanings.sent5: The overindulgences in rich foods made the feast unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act of indulging excessively in something.
meanings.sent1: Their overindulgences in shopping left them with empty wallets.
meanings.sent2: The overindulgences in gossip caused unnecessary drama.
meanings.sent3: The overindulgences in movie nights became a weekly tradition.
meanings.sent4: His overindulgences in video games kept him up all night.
meanings.sent5: The overindulgences in compliments made her blush.
